description:
An once-ornately decorated robe with an unfamiliar royal symbol on it, now made threadbare by time.  The humanoid figure on the seal has two pairs of eyes.  It is the only one of its kind.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

A set of worn leather gloves embossed with silver.  The unidentifiable leather it is made from is oddly soft.  It is the only one of its kind.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

A pair of ancient leather boots.  Though the flaps of leather are crudely sewn together, the red hue it is dyed with is striking.  It is the only one of its kind.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

A sword made out of a striking black metal.  It is the only one of its kind.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

description:
A ritual knife used by some ancient civilization.  Unreadable runes are carved into the handle.  It is the only one of its kind.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

A sturdy wooden pole with a sharp bronze spike on the end.  The handle has the symbol of a blue sun on it.  It is the only one of its kind.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.
